title: Mobile Mathematics Competency Enhancement Course Using IMS Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational arithmetic operations and understanding of fractions/decimal concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with modular lessons structured in 15-minute daily units.

learning_goals: Learners can complete over 80% of weekly math problem-solving modules following the IMS instructional design framework
Learners can improve error correction rates by over 70% using a real-time feedback system provided in a mobile environment
Learners can achieve over 70% accuracy in basic applied math problems on a diagnostic assessment at course completion

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
